note.value: Identification of script and text by Michelle Brown and Daniela Mairhofer
The text is that of Jerome’s Vulgate edition; there are a couple of minor variants, but from the small sample of text that remains it seems to be a good Vulgate, perhaps of Northumbrian type (Brown).
Description by Michelle P. Brown, David Ganz, Daniela Mairhofer

Bibliography: M. P. Brown, The Book of Cerne, London and Toronto: BL and University of Toronto, 1996 ; M. P.
